h1.img: TMISD is offering Free Curbside Meals

div.div:
Curbside Meals will include Breakfast and lunch for children 18 years and younger and Special Education students under the age of 22.

h2.span: NOTICE OF REQUEST FOR COMPETITIVE SEALED PROPOSALS

br.span:
Tuloso-Midway Independent School District is accepting competitive sealed proposals for:
FY20-P-0008 (Middle School and High School Re-Roofing)
FY20-P-0009 (High School Restroom Renovation)
Proposal information and electronic copies of the Bid Documents are available from the project Architect, WKMC Architects- ccastor@wkmcarchitects.com and area plan rooms.

span.em: Through these pages we will provide current information about our district. Our goal is to make information readily available to communicate with students, parents, teachers, and the community.

div.span:
We hope you find this site both informative and enjoyable.
Thank you for visiting.

font.span: Tuloso Midway Independent School District does not discriminate on the basis of age, sex, disability, race, color or national origin in its educational programs, activities or employment as required by Title IX, Section 504 and Title VI.

font.b: Es norma de Tuloso Midway ISD no discriminar por motivos de raza, color,origen national, sexo o impedimento, en sus programas, servicios o activades vocacionales, tal como lo requieren el Título VI de la Ley de Deprechos Civiles de 1964, según enmienda; el Título IX.

span.em: By providing links to other sites, Tuloso-Midway ISD does not guarantee, approve, or endorse the information or products available on these sites.
